short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab Chrome extension for relaxation and mindful browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indulge in moments of tranquility and find your inner zen with Zen Moments New tab. Every new tab provides changing backgrounds & a browsing session with a reminder to pause, breathe, and embrace the serenity within.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Zen Moments extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://zenmomentsapp.com/tos/ and Privacy Policy https://zenmomentsapp.com/privacy/ 

Install Zen Moments now and create a blissful browsing experience like no other. Discover peace and inspiration every time you open a new tab.

Note: Zen Moments does not collect personal data or interfere with your browsing privacy.
